title: From Sean 'Diddy' Combs to Harvey Weinstein: List of celebrities facing sexual misconduct charges
Sean 'Diddy' Combs placed on 'suicide watch' after arrest in sex trafficking case: Reports
content: Sean 'Diddy' Combs, aged 54, is currently on suicide watch at Brooklyn's Metropolitan Detention Center as he awaits trial for sex trafficking charges. After being denied bail twice, he was moved to the MDC on September 17. His legal team has highlighted concerns regarding the facility's dangerous conditions and sought his transfer to another location.
summary: Sean 'Diddy' Combs, aged 54, is currently on suicide watch at Brooklyn's Metropolitan Detention Center as he awaits trial for sex trafficking charges. After being denied bail twice, he was moved to the MDC on September 17. His legal team has highlighted concerns regarding the facility's dangerous conditions and sought his transfer to another location.

title: 'Typhoon Pulasan': Second typhoon hits Shanghai days after a historic storm
content: Shanghai was hit by major flooding on Friday as Typhoon Pulasan made landfall in the Fengxian district with wind speeds of 83 km/h. This came just after the city was recovering from Typhoon Bebinca. Heavy rain persisted into Friday morning, but no severe damage or injuries were reported. By 11am, many flooded areas had been cleared.
summary: Shanghai was hit by major flooding on Friday as Typhoon Pulasan made landfall in the Fengxian district with wind speeds of 83 km/h. This came just after the city was recovering from Typhoon Bebinca. Heavy rain persisted into Friday morning, but no severe damage or injuries were reported. By 11am, many flooded areas had been cleared.

title: Watch: Chilling video shows teenager sneaking into mother's bedroom to kill her
content: Carly Gregg, a 15-year-old girl from Mississippi, faces charges of murder and attempted murder after allegedly killing her mother and shooting her stepfather. The incident occurred following the discovery of her drug use by her mother. Surveillance footage captures the events leading up to the crime. Gregg is pursuing an insanity defense.
summary: Carly Gregg, a 15-year-old girl from Mississippi, faces charges of murder and attempted murder after allegedly killing her mother and shooting her stepfather. The incident occurred following the discovery of her drug use by her mother. Surveillance footage captures the events leading up to the crime. Gregg is pursuing an insanity defense.

title: 'Have your head examined': Trump suggests Jews partly responsible if he loses
content: At a pro-Israel conference in Washington DC, former US President Donald Trump criticised American Jewish voters supporting Kamala Harris. He warned of existential threats to Israel if Harris wins the election. Trump also addressed rising antisemitism on college campuses and vowed to revoke federal support for universities allowing antisemitic propaganda.
summary: At a pro-Israel conference in Washington DC, former US President Donald Trump criticised American Jewish voters supporting Kamala Harris. He warned of existential threats to Israel if Harris wins the election. Trump also addressed rising antisemitism on college campuses and vowed to revoke federal support for universities allowing antisemitic propaganda.

title: Watch: Python attacks, squeezes Thai woman for two hours before rescue
content: Arom Arunroj, a 64-year-old woman from near Bangkok, Thailand, was attacked by a large python while doing dishes. The snake bit her thigh and constricted her for almost two hours before neighbors alerted authorities. She sustained minor bites and was freed when police struck the snake with a crowbar.
summary: Arom Arunroj, a 64-year-old woman from near Bangkok, Thailand, was attacked by a large python while doing dishes. The snake bit her thigh and constricted her for almost two hours before neighbors alerted authorities. She sustained minor bites and was freed when police struck the snake with a crowbar.

title: TikTok’s Tanghulu trend: Glass fruit treat turns sour with severe burn injuries among children
content: A TikTok trend called Tanghulu, involving boiling sugar and water to create "glass fruit," has led to a surge in severe burn injuries among children. Medical professionals caution that melted sugar can cause deep burns. Parents should ensure their children know proper cooking safety before trying this trend at home.
summary: A TikTok trend called Tanghulu, involving boiling sugar and water to create "glass fruit," has led to a surge in severe burn injuries among children. Medical professionals caution that melted sugar can cause deep burns. Parents should ensure their children know proper cooking safety before trying this trend at home.

title: 'If you're exhausted by craziness ... ': Kamala Harris, Oprah team up for high-profile event in Michigan
content: Oprah Winfrey endorsed Kamala Harris’s presidential campaign during a virtual rally in Oakland County, Michigan. She urged undecided voters to support Harris for a better future. The event featured personal stories from families affected by violence and included participation from celebrities like Chris Rock and Jennifer Lopez, highlighting the urgency for change.
summary: Oprah Winfrey endorsed Kamala Harris’s presidential campaign during a virtual rally in Oakland County, Michigan. She urged undecided voters to support Harris for a better future. The event featured personal stories from families affected by violence and included participation from celebrities like Chris Rock and Jennifer Lopez, highlighting the urgency for change.

title: FIRs filed against Rahul Gandhi for allegedly hurting Sikh sentiments
content: Three FIRs have been registered against Congress leader Rahul Gandhi in Chhattisgarh for allegedly making remarks that hurt Sikh religious sentiments during his US visit. BJP leaders lodged complaints accusing him of disrespecting Sikh traditions. The cases were filed in Raipur, Bilaspur, and Durg districts under sections 299 and 302 of the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita.
summary: Three FIRs have been registered against Congress leader Rahul Gandhi in Chhattisgarh for allegedly making remarks that hurt Sikh religious sentiments during his US visit. BJP leaders lodged complaints accusing him of disrespecting Sikh traditions. The cases were filed in Raipur, Bilaspur, and Durg districts under sections 299 and 302 of the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita.

title: Barking Pandas? Chinese Zoo under fire for dyeing dogs black and white to trick visitors; see video
content: Visitors at Shanwei zoo in China discovered that the pandas were actually dogs painted with black and white markings. The zoo admitted to dyeing chow chows after public outrage and demands for refunds. This incident is similar to a previous case at Taizhou Zoo, where dogs were also disguised as pandas.
summary: Visitors at Shanwei zoo in China discovered that the pandas were actually dogs painted with black and white markings. The zoo admitted to dyeing chow chows after public outrage and demands for refunds. This incident is similar to a previous case at Taizhou Zoo, where dogs were also disguised as pandas.

title: Elon Musk' X goes offline again in Brazil after court order: What is the spat all about?
content: Elon Musk's social media platform X was blocked again in Brazil after briefly resuming service despite a judicial ban. The Supreme Court ordered the suspension for non-compliance with court rulings. The conflict involves Musk's refusal to remove certain accounts and appoint a legal representative, resulting in fines and asset freezes.
summary: Elon Musk's social media platform X was blocked again in Brazil after briefly resuming service despite a judicial ban. The Supreme Court ordered the suspension for non-compliance with court rulings. The conflict involves Musk's refusal to remove certain accounts and appoint a legal representative, resulting in fines and asset freezes.

title: Israeli strikes, sonic booms rattle Lebanon; device blasts toll hits 37
content: Israeli attacks on Hezbollah's communication systems in Lebanon have killed 37 people and injured around 3,000. Hezbollah leader Hassan Nasrallah condemned the actions as war crimes and promised retaliation. The Israeli military continues to target Hezbollah positions, heightening regional tensions with ongoing exchanges of fire between both sides.
summary: Israeli attacks on Hezbollah's communication systems in Lebanon have killed 37 people and injured around 3,000. Hezbollah leader Hassan Nasrallah condemned the actions as war crimes and promised retaliation. The Israeli military continues to target Hezbollah positions, heightening regional tensions with ongoing exchanges of fire between both sides.

title: Canada imposes post-study work program curbs
content: Canada's immigration minister, Marc Miller, announced that the cap on international students will remain alongside new measures to manage temporary resident arrivals. These changes include modifications to the post-graduate work programme and spousal work eligibility, impacting many Indian students. The student permit intake cap will decrease by 10% in 2025.
summary: Canada's immigration minister, Marc Miller, announced that the cap on international students will remain alongside new measures to manage temporary resident arrivals. These changes include modifications to the post-graduate work programme and spousal work eligibility, impacting many Indian students. The student permit intake cap will decrease by 10% in 2025.

title: How Israel built a modern-day Trojan Horse: Exploding pagers
Elon Musk finds a (temporary) way around Brazil's ban on X
content: Elon Musk's social network, X, briefly resumed operations in Brazil after being blocked for three weeks by the Supreme Court. The platform circumvented restrictions by routing traffic through Cloudflare. However, Brazil's telecommunications regulator is attempting to reinstate the block. This episode highlights ongoing tensions between national laws and global internet companies.
summary: Elon Musk's social network, X, briefly resumed operations in Brazil after being blocked for three weeks by the Supreme Court. The platform circumvented restrictions by routing traffic through Cloudflare. However, Brazil's telecommunications regulator is attempting to reinstate the block. This episode highlights ongoing tensions between national laws and global internet companies.

title: Sheriff kills district judge in Kentucky courthouse, investigation underway
content: Sheriff Mickey Stines allegedly shot and killed district judge Kevin Mullins inside the Letcher County Courthouse in Kentucky following an argument. Stines has been charged with first-degree murder. Authorities are investigating the motive behind this tragic incident, which has shaken the small town's community deeply.
summary: Sheriff Mickey Stines allegedly shot and killed district judge Kevin Mullins inside the Letcher County Courthouse in Kentucky following an argument. Stines has been charged with first-degree murder. Authorities are investigating the motive behind this tragic incident, which has shaken the small town's community deeply.

title: Harris to livestream with Oprah, Trump to address Israeli-American group
content: Vice President Kamala Harris and former President Donald Trump are stepping up their campaign efforts. Harris will join Oprah Winfrey in Michigan, while Trump speaks at the Israeli-American Council event. The “Uncommitted” Democratic protest movement won't endorse Harris but urges votes against Trump. These activities follow a significant Federal Reserve interest rate cut.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris and former President Donald Trump are stepping up their campaign efforts. Harris will join Oprah Winfrey in Michigan, while Trump speaks at the Israeli-American Council event. The “Uncommitted” Democratic protest movement won't endorse Harris but urges votes against Trump. These activities follow a significant Federal Reserve interest rate cut.

title: Mark Robinson stays in NC governor's race amid bombshell report backlash
content: North Carolina Lieutenant Governor Mark Robinson, the Republican nominee for governor, is under fire following a CNN report alleging he made inflammatory comments on a porn site’s message board over a decade ago. Despite some GOP members urging him to step aside, Robinson denies the allegations and vows to continue his campaign.
summary: North Carolina Lieutenant Governor Mark Robinson, the Republican nominee for governor, is under fire following a CNN report alleging he made inflammatory comments on a porn site’s message board over a decade ago. Despite some GOP members urging him to step aside, Robinson denies the allegations and vows to continue his campaign.

title: Taylor Swift: A pop phenomenon with presidential-level appeal on voters
content: Taylor Swift endorsed Vice President Kamala Harris for the 2024 presidential race on Instagram, sparking political discussions. A poll indicates a partisan divide in opinions about Swift, with higher favorability among Democrats than Republicans. Former President Donald Trump criticized Swift on Truth Social, underscoring the polarized reactions to her endorsement.
summary: Taylor Swift endorsed Vice President Kamala Harris for the 2024 presidential race on Instagram, sparking political discussions. A poll indicates a partisan divide in opinions about Swift, with higher favorability among Democrats than Republicans. Former President Donald Trump criticized Swift on Truth Social, underscoring the polarized reactions to her endorsement.

title: Pakistan blames Afghanistan for supporting terrorism
content: Pakistan has raised alarms at the UN Security Council regarding a severe terrorism threat from Afghanistan, emphasizing the rise of militant groups like Tehreek-i-Taliban Pakistan (TTP). Ambassador Munir Akram accused the Afghan interim government of backing TTP and called for global cooperation to tackle this issue. Pakistan plans further national actions against these threats.
summary: Pakistan has raised alarms at the UN Security Council regarding a severe terrorism threat from Afghanistan, emphasizing the rise of militant groups like Tehreek-i-Taliban Pakistan (TTP). Ambassador Munir Akram accused the Afghan interim government of backing TTP and called for global cooperation to tackle this issue. Pakistan plans further national actions against these threats.
